jobDescription: Job DescriptionWhy you want to work here:Exciting opportunity to join a fast-growing company in the fashion world!Get in on the ground floor with a company that is already highly profitable and offers extreme growth opportunity.What You Will DoWork closely with multiple, cross-functional teams in gathering/mining dataData will be derived from email marketing campaigns and social media analytics and will focus on trends and insights for profit growthDefine, automate and validate the extraction of new metrics for use in future analysis and reportsDefine and implement weekly/monthly reports regarding key performance metrics, action items and alertsGenerate analysis and develop key insights from various data sources to come up with actionable recommendationsDesign and build reports, dashboards, and analysis in Netsuite, Excel, SQL, and TableauWhat Gets You the Job?3+ years’ Business Intelligence experience within a consumer goods environment (i.e. fashion, e-commerce, B2C, etc.)M.B.A. or Master’s Degree in Science, Engineering, Statistics, Math (or related field of study)Expert-level SQL experience and knowledge of Netsuite, Google Analytics, Google Query, Python, Tableau and ExcelBusiness-driven, results-oriented, with strong analytical and problem-solving abilityAbility to perform query optimizationNice to have: Prior experience with A/B testing and e-commerce marketing dataKeywords: Advanced SQL/query optimization, Tableau/Microstrategy reporting, Google Analytics, Python, (A/B testing, E-commerce marketing data for Acquisition, Retention, Retargeting, SEO, Social Media, fashion/e-commerce/B2C, Master's degree) Compensation: $130,000/Year◄
